content.service_detail: UniNext provides solutions for diverse fields: UniNext can cater to a wide range of industries, from software development to specialized consulting services, offering flexibility and efficiency to meet all business needs.
content.solutions_detail: UniNext can cater to a wide range of industries, from software development to specialized consulting services, providing flexibility and efficiency for all business needs.
content.good_service_detail: We are committed to ensuring that all products and services provided by UniNext meet the standards and fulfill all requirements set by customers with the best quality, tailored to the specific needs of each business or individual.
content.good_price_detail: UniNext offers services that are tailored to the budget of each client. We provide a variety of service packages at competitive prices, ensuring that all clients can access high-quality services.
content.good_support_detail: At UniNext, the customer is always at the center of our every activity and decision. Our team of professional and enthusiastic staff is always ready to support customers 24/7 to answer any questions, and handle any problems that arise quickly and thoroughly.
content.good_team_detail: UniNext has a team of professional, experienced, and passionate staff in the field. We are always updating our knowledge and constantly improving our skills to provide customers with the best service.
content.core_value_detail: With the rapid pace of development in IT today, UniNext is constantly striving to innovate and update new technologies to improve ourselves.
content.core_value_detail2: As a software company, we aim to provide the best possible solutions and services while still saving costs for our customers.

footer.about_us: UniNext is a technology company specializing in providing information technology solutions and services. We believe that technology is the key to sustainable business development.
footer.about_us2: UniNext aspires to be a reliable companion for you on your digital transformation journey. We will work with you to build a modern, dynamic, and more efficient business.
footer.contact_infor_detail: No. 34, Alley 5, Hoang Quoc Viet Street, Nghia Do Ward, Cau Giay District, Hanoi City, Vietnam

about.slogan_about: Uninext is a technology company specializing in providing information technology solutions and services. With a young, dynamic and well-trained team, Uninext always strives to bring customers high-quality products and services, meeting the needs of customers.
about.history_about: Driven by a passion for technology, a group of experienced engineers came together. They clearly saw the booming development trend of digital technology, and at the same time saw its potential in promoting the economy in general and supporting businesses in particular. From there, the name Uninext was born.
about.history_about2: With careful market research and feedback from reputable garages in Hanoi, UniNext launched its first product - garage management software. This "first child" quickly won the trust of many garages, affirming the position of UniNext on the market and becoming a solid foundation for further goals. With its belief and continuous efforts, Uninext is committed to bringing values ​​and solutions that help promote the digital economy, bringing practical value to society.

carnext.content1: Carnext is a comprehensive software solution designed to address the needs of businesses in the automotive industry. It helps you manage every aspect of your workshop operations, from customer intake and vehicle repair to inventory control, billing, and customer service.
carnext.content2: Carnext streamlines your workshop's workflows by eliminating time-consuming manual data entry, ultimately boosting your garage's revenue.

carinfo.content1: With the desire to create a dedicated ecosystem for customers and garages, Uninext has developed the Carinfo software - a software specifically designed for garage customers. This software facilitates easy communication between car owners and garages directly on the platform, eliminating the need for in-person meetings.
carinfo.content2: Additionally, customers can confirm quotes and track the status of their car directly within the software, saving them time and effort compared to calling or visiting the garage in person. Let Carinfo software help you create the best possible experience for your garage customers.

outsource_service.introduce_detail: Off-shore development is a form of outsourcing all or part of the software, website, or information system development activities to companies abroad.
outsource_service.introduce_detail2: Off-shore companies often have lower labor costs than developed countries, so off-shore development can help you save money.

fire_protection.title: Fire Protection Equipment Management Application Development
fire_protection.content: UniNext provides a solution to help businesses/organizations effectively manage their fire protection equipment.
fire_protection.content2: The application is designed to meet the diverse needs of customers, from tracking operating status, maintenance history, equipment inventory management to planning periodic inspections, ensuring fire safety.

mobile_dev.title: Mobile Development
mobile_dev.content: We provide multi-platform mobile application development services for iOS and Android, helping you reach a large number of users on different devices.
mobile_dev.content2: Uninext has a team of experienced engineers who are knowledgeable about the latest technologies, ensuring to create high-quality mobile applications that fully meet your needs.

web_dev.title: Web Development
web_dev.content: Uninext provides professional website development services to meet all your needs.
web_dev.content2: Your website will have all the necessary features, an eye-catching and attractive interface, and be built on the most advanced web technologies. As a result, the website always operates stably, with high security and easy to manage.

solution.title: Software Solutions
solution.content: UniNext provides software development services for businesses, helping you automate processes, improve operational efficiency and increase profits.
solution.content2: Software solutions designed specifically for each business will help you optimize your workflow, save time and money.

IT_consultant.title: IT Consulting
IT_consultant.content: With a team of experienced consultants and experts in the industry, UniNext is confident to provide customers with comprehensive consulting services on digital transformation, system development and operation, as well as system design for many diverse fields.

why_choose.title: WHY CHOOSE UNINEXT FOR OFFSHORE DEVELOPMENT PROJECT?

team.title: Competent Team
team.content: 100% of our employees graduated from universities. Our team is well-trained and regularly updated on the latest technologies, ensuring that we can meet all customer requirements.

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: UniNext is always committed to providing customers with the highest quality projects, meeting international standards and matching actual needs.
quality.content2: We have a systematic and rigorous project management process that ensures close monitoring of progress, control of output quality, and optimization of operational efficiency.

speed.title: Rapid Development Speed
speed.content: UniNext applies a scientific working process that optimizes time and resources, helping to accelerate project progress while still ensuring quality.
speed.content2: We are flexible in adjusting our processes and working methods to suit the specific requirements of each project.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.content: Uninext is always ready to support and cooperate with you.
